arguments.response_text:
I just moved from Zimbabwe to the U.S. about a year and three months ago.
I came by New Orleans. I first came to Chicago in December of 2023 and
I came to the city. It was freezing cold and when I got here I said I'm gonna move here. I fell in
love with the city. I fell in love with Chicago. Then three months later I moved to Chicago.
I've been in Chicago now for three months and moving here has been such a great experience.
I have fallen in love with America because of Chicago and it's just been such a great experience
having to be here, getting to know myself, getting to improve on being a better person
and you know it's such a melting pot of cultures so I love it here.
arguments.response_summary: The person moved from Zimbabwe to the U.S. about a year and three months ago, specifically to Chicago. They fell in love with the city and have been enjoying their experience here, appreciating its cultural diversity.
arguments.matched_prompt: How did you and your family build a life in Chicago?
